thread.title: Shorth Break
thread.title_full: Shorth Break - Review of Doubletree by Hilton London - Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: magsm0ll0y
title: Shorth Break
text: The hotel was spotless . The staff are amazing they couldnt do enough for you . We where in London for my sons birthday and our stay at the DoubleTree made it extra specail for him . When we checkinging Paula at the desk said happy birthday to my son he was thrilled . Wr loved our stay here and will deffently be back .
